{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3321789,"name":"Fedor Leonov","username":"fedorlspp26","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fedorlspp26/{size}/240103_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-02T01:10:36.066Z","cooked":"

Hello! I am typing this on phone so sorry for any formatting errors.

Using the standard Limelight library, is there any way we can pull info (e.g. tx value) from a specific ID AprilTag (that isn’t necessarily being focused on) given an image of 2 AprilTags? Thank you!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-03-02T01:10:36.066Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":37,"reads":79,"readers_count":78,"score":200.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":456905,"topic_slug":"limelight-apriltag-pull-info-from-specific-id","display_username":"Fedor Leonov","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55420,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5438 CAD Captain"},"post_url":"/t/limelight-apriltag-pull-info-from-specific-id/456905/1","custom_user_title":"5438 CAD Captain","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3321971,"name":"","username":"ivermani","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/eb8c5e/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-02T05:51:18.794Z","cooked":"

I haven’t tested this yet, but I think the new 2024.1 image allows you to select a priority tag that will be used to get tx/ty from, even if it isn’t the largest tag in the image.

See priorityid here: Complete NetworkTables API | Limelight Documentation

See the 2024.1 Change log here:

docs.limelightvision.io

Software Change Log | Limelight Documentation

Contact us or post to CD to suggest upgrades for Limelight!

Make sure to save offline copies of your pipelines before flashing!
